title: 2011년 Thomas West v. Janice Brewer 사건

## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Thomas West v. Janice Brewer
**판결일**: 2011-07-18
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

zona.

For respondent-appellant Ryan: Thomas C. Horne, Attorney

Tucson, Arizona.
